user_query: I'm organizing a language learning workshop and I need engaging word-related content. Fetch the word of the day from multiple sources to provide interesting examples and exercises. Additionally, provide me with the current word of the day from Merriam-Webster and Dictionary.com to expand our participants' vocabulary. Lastly, recommend a website where I can access financial data to discuss economic terms in different languages.

TaskList.description: Fetch the word of the day from multiple sources, including Merriam-Webster and Dictionary.com.
Compile and format engaging examples and exercises based on the fetched words of the day.
Recommend a reliable website for accessing financial data to discuss economic terms.
